ValidationRule.description: Discount 1 Fields have to be null, PPS Discount, or Global for Payroll Processing Services Package
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) , Payroll_Processing_Services_Package__c || Payroll_Processing_Services_Plus_Package__c , NOT( ISPICKVAL( WIN_Check__c , "")) && OR( ISPICKVAL( WIN_Check__c , "WIN") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ***Discount field must be *PPS Discount*,*National Account* or *Global* when discounting a PPS package***
